mapper.update:
update BUS_ORDER
STATUS = #{STATUS},
PRICE = #{PRICE},
PRODUCT_ID = #{PRODUCT_ID},
USER_ID = #{USER_ID},
where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select: select o.ID, o.STATUS, o.PRICE, o.PRODUCT_ID, o.USER_ID, o.CREATED_DATE, a.USERNAME, p.NAME from BUS_ORDER o,sys_app_user a,bus_product p where o.user_id = a.USER_ID AND o.product_id = p.id AND o.ID = #{ID}

select o.id, o.status, o.price, o.created_date, a.username, p.name from bus_order o,bus_product p,sys_app_user a where o.product_id = p.id AND o.user_id = a.user_id
and a.USERNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{USERNAME}),'%')
mapper.delete:
delete from BUS_ORDER where ID in
#{item}
mapper.sql: USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, RIGHTS, ROLE_ID, LAST_LOGIN, IP, STATUS, BZ, PHONE, SFID, START_TIME, END_TIME, YEARS, NUMBER, EMAIL, THIRD_TYPE, image_url, city, province, sex, address
mapper.insert: insert into sys_app_user (USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, RIGHTS, ROLE_ID, LAST_LOGIN, IP, STATUS, BZ, PHONE, SFID, START_TIME, END_TIME, YEARS, NUMBER, EMAIL, THIRD_TYPE, image_url, city, province, sex, address) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{years,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update sys_app_user
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RIGHTS = #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFID = #{sfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YEARS = #{years,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
THIRD_TYPE = #{thirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sys_app_user set USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RIGHTS = #{rights,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_LOGIN = #{lastLogin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ = #{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFID = #{sfid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YEARS = #{years,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NUMBER = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, THIRD_TYPE = #{thirdType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
